name: Fooze
description:
You're an experimental being that can divide itself into small mass balls, your goal is to escape the lab without being caught.

Controls:

WASD - Move the ball

Mouse cursor - Point your mass shooting.

Misc:

F - Toggles fullscreen

R - restarts level

Credits

Jefftastic - programming, level design, sfx, art, etc

Coffee Bat -Music, level design, art
